description: This file defines the Express.js route handlers for user authentication, including registration, login, and fetching current user profile. It includes route setup, validation middleware, Swagger API documentation comments, and external module references.

methods.name: router.post('/register')
methods.description: Handles user registration with email, password, optional name, and uses validation middleware.

methods.name: router.post('/login')
methods.description: Handles user login with email and password, using validation middleware.

methods.name: router.get('/me')
methods.description: Retrieves current authenticated user's profile, requiring authentication middleware.
